summary: Nightingale Armor Dark Red - Retexture - Skyrim Nexus
descriptionHtml:
First of all, sorry of my poor English. I\'m Spanish.

Well, this is my first mod, and now I can say that is difficult to do a simply retexture.
It\'s not a WOW of a armor, yeah, I pass a lot with the saturation, but I\'m happy, yes. :D

Installation:

Simply, put the files in C:\\Program Files (x86)\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data\\Textures\\armor\\nightingale\\m (or Steam, i don\'t have Steam so..) or simply extract the content of the .zip in C:\\Program Files (x86)\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data\\Textures.

Console codes:
Nightingale Armor 000fcc0f
Nightingale Hood 000fcc13
Nightingale Gauntlets 000fcc11
Nightingale Boots 000fcc0d

Remember, first \"player.additem\" and then the code, and after, put how many do you want, for example, for Nightingale armor: \"player.additem 000fcc0f 1\".

Unistallation:

Really I have to explain this?

___

I don\'t now if this works with every mod, but I have:
- Bustersword, Masamune, Souba swords mod.
- Glamdring LOTR mod.
- Midas Spell Magic mod.
- Duel Combat Realism mod.
- Faster Horses 1.5X Sprint mod.. and a few others that I don\'t remember, but they work cool with my mod.

Programs:

- Photoshop CS5
- GIMP 2.6
- FOMM

Greetings, Dovahkiin.

PD (29-1-2012): The color of the armor is Dark Red, however, I edited twice times because the saturation, so the images are no the truly color. Tomorrow I will be change the images. Thaaaaanks.
PD (30-1-12): The color of the armor correspond what you see in the images. Thanks. I will be working in this retexture, putting color on the details and more, and probably I will do another color and all of that.
author: Wasgodunk
